name: printers-discovery
description: Application to analyze the local network in search of prototypes of printers, capturing and storing their information

scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev --prefix client && npm run build-dev --prefix server
scripts.heroku-prebuild: rm -r client package.json && mv server/* . && rm -r server
scripts.i: npm i && npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server
